remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何禁止显示脚本错误并显示您自己的自定义对话框。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序承载 名为的控件 `webBrowser1` 。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `HtmlWindow1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#451)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#451](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#451)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果希望向用户显示自己的自定义错误消息或完全禁止显示错误，请将此属性设置为。Set this property to `true` if you wish to display your own custom error message to the user, or suppress the error entirely. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何禁止显示脚本错误并显示您自己的自定义对话框。The following code example demonstrates how to suppress a script error and display your own custom dialog box. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序承载 名为的控件 `webBrowser1` 。This code example requires that your application host a control named `webBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果承载的是包含帧的 HTML 文档，则可能不会很明显地会导致错误发生的帧。If you are hosting an HTML document that contains frames, it might not be evident which frame is responsible for generating the error. 使用此属性可提供调试信息，使开发人员可以更好地缩小问题范围。Use this property to provide debugging information so that a developer can better narrow down the problem. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `HtmlWindow1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `HtmlWindow1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
